page.title: 02Post Office (Brockhampton)
page.content: In April 1984 the Bringsty Post Office was closed at the old Office. The new Post Office (Pool Cottage) is about one mile away from the old Post Office.There is a half day on Wednes- day's and it is not open on Sunday. There is an hour dinner break five days a week.Thursday is the busiest day of the week because lots of people come for their pension.It is very hard to learn how to do Giros,stamps, bus tickets,train tickets & television stamps & these are only some of the trans-actions.After the Post office has shut a daily account is completed, on a Friday there is a weekly account to do.Stamps,giros television stamps & dated taking several hours.There are two letter collections & one delivery each day exept Sunday's.
